about.title: About Askia
about.subtitle: Helping top talent secure high-paying tech roles.
about.body: This program is about more than just landing a job. It’s about unlocking your potential, telling your story with confidence, and building a career that excites you and pays what you’re worth. With insights from the hiring table, we position you as the standout candidate without wasting months on cold applications.

coach.title: Meet Steve, Your Career Coach
coach.credential: Former engineering leader turned top tech career strategist
coach.body: Steve brings real-world hiring experience and a tactical, human approach to career transitions. You’ll work directly with him to build clarity, confidence, and a repeatable system that lands interviews.

steps.title: Find the Roles That Pay What You’re Worth
steps.body: Define your target roles and compensation band with data‑backed positioning.

steps.title: Build a Resume & LinkedIn That Get Noticed
steps.body: Craft a concise, high‑impact narrative recruiters actually respond to.

steps.title: Land Interviews Faster With Smart Search
steps.body: Replace scattershot applying with focused outreach and referral strategy.

steps.title: Ace the Interviews & Negotiate Top Offers
steps.body: Master behavioral + technical interviews, then negotiate with confidence.

steps.title: Week 1 · Strategy
steps.body: Clarify target roles, compensation, and a focused search plan.

steps.title: Week 2 · Positioning
steps.body: Ship a standout resume, LinkedIn profile, and outreach assets.

steps.title: Weeks 3–4 · Interviews
steps.body: Practice interviews, refine stories, and build confidence.

steps.title: Weeks 4–6 · Offers
steps.body: Negotiate, compare offers, and close strong.

cta.title: Get Ready to Rewrite Your Story
cta.body: If you’re ready to move from vague goals to a clear plan and real offers, we’ll help you get there.
